# matplotlib.pyplot.polar

matplotlib.pyplot.polar(*args, **kwargs)[source]

    
Make a polar plot.

call signature:

    
    polar(theta, r, **kwargs)
    
Multiple theta, r arguments are supported, with format strings, as in `plot`.
